channel.title: How do i add text in the emotes?
channel.description:
I am trying to make an emote teleport but i can only make the tele, not the word on the emote tab thing... (the owner of the source delted the emotes (yes, no, wave etc...) on all of theemote tabs so thats a problem...
SO HOW DO I MAKE THE TEXT ON THE EMOTES AGAIN!!!!

item.title: How do i add text in the emotes?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

that doesnt work for me!!! i guess i’ll have to just use a regualr pimpscape server because i dont get 1 letter u are saysing lol!
